Set amidst the stunning mountains on the Ba River Navala is a 200 year old picturesque village built in the old ways preserving the traditional native 'bure' or thatched hut. Navala is home to roughly 1000 people.Village CeremonyUpon arrival in the village you will be met by the Chief and your guides.Kava CeremonyA traditional welcome villageHistorical SitesYou will then be taken on a guided tour of the village the village school mingle with the locals and hear old legends and stories of this beautiful ancient village. You will also witness various activities such as coconut tree climbing and also sample the cool coconut juice from freshly picked coconut. Our comfortable and convenient Navala Village Stay offers comfortable doubles & Singles.
